page.title: 03SOUTH NORMANTON NEWS
page.content: The items that follow are about news in the South Normanton and Pinxton area.They have been taken from local news papers published between the end of May 1985 and the end of June 1985. 1. This report concerns a closure of a pit workshop in Blackwell and the loss of jobs of disabled workers.The M.P Dennis Skinner doesn't agree with the shut down and sent a letter to the N.C.B. director for North Derbyshire, saying so.The N.C.B. replied with the fact that all 240 workers involved with the closure will be given jobs within a reasonable distance of the Blackwell area. 2. On Saturday June 1st 1985 twelve people took part in a sponsored three legged pub-crawl to raise money for sufferers of Muscular Dystrophy.They managed to raise Â£100.They stopped at every pub they passed.
